item.description:
We are meeting this time at Smith College, at the Campus Center in the Cafe, at 6:00pm. They serve great food here.. so from 6-7pm it will be a dinner meeting, following with another hour for planning:

1. November 3rd 9/11 Symposium promoting and carpooling

2. November 14 film and discussion, facilitation and topic focus

3. Other venues for Richard Gage and Steve Jones at Smith College
and elsewhere around the time when they are in the northeast, November 3rd
and December 15-16 around the Boston Tea Party weekend.

4. Choose next film for group for December 12. will try to have flyers ready for november 14th event.

5. Open Agenda Items

I hope folks come to this meeting. As per process, the majority at meetings
can make decisions for our group.

[PS: This was posted by Jonathan Mark]

campus center cafe link
item.name: Organizational Meeting
